title: Rugby World Cup 2019 – Fiji vs Uruguay live!
text:
Follow live updates from the Rugby World Cup as Fiji take on Uruguay in Pool D.

After threatening to upset Australia in their opening encounter, Fiji will go into the clash as favourites for victory.

Uruguay, meanwhile, will be playing their first match in Japan having had a bye in round one, though they face an uphill task as the weakest side in the pool. Follow live updates below:

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Teams Fiji XV: Veitokani; Nakosi, Radradra, Vatubua, Goneva; J Matavesi, Seniloli; Mawi, Dolokoto, Saulo; Ratuva, Ratuniyarawa; Waqaniburotu, Voka, Nakarawa.

Uruguay XV: Mieres; Freitas, Cat, Vilaseca, Silva; Berchesi, Arata; Sanguinetti, Kessler, Arbelo; Dotti, Leindekar; Gaminara, Civetta, Diana.

Hello all and welcome to The Independent's live coverage of this morning's Rugby World Cup clash between Fiji and Uruguay. We'll be bringing you all the live action, reaction and analysis - so make sure to stay tuned!

When is it?

Fiji vs Uruguay takes place on Wednesday 25 September at the Kamaishi Recovery Memorial Stadium.

What time does it start?

The match kicks off at 2:15pm Japan Standard Time, which is 6:15am BST.

Where can I watch it?

The match will be shown live on ITV 4 and the ITV Hub from 5:45am.
description: Follow live updates from the Rugby World Cup as Fiji take on Uruguay in Pool D. After threatening to upset Australia in their opening encounter, Fiji will go into the clash as favourites for victory. Uruguay, meanwhile, will be playing their first match in Japan having had a bye in round one, though they face an uphill task as the weakest side in the pool. Follow live updates
